019package org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu;
020
021import com.google.gson.JsonObject;
022import io.kubernetes.client.custom.Quantity;
023import io.kubernetes.client.custom.Quantity.Format;
024import io.kubernetes.client.custom.V1Patch;
025import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiException;
026import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.apis.ApisApi;
027import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.apis.CustomObjectsApi;
028import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.apis.EventsV1Api;
029import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.EventsV1Event;
030import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1APIGroup;
031import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1GroupVersionForDiscovery;
032import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1ObjectMeta;
033import io.kubernetes.client.util.Config;
034import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.dynamic.DynamicKubernetesApi;
035import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.dynamic.DynamicKubernetesObject;
036import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.options.PatchOptions;
037import java.io.IOException;
038import java.math.BigDecimal;
039import java.nio.file.Files;
040import java.nio.file.Path;
041import java.time.Instant;
042import java.time.OffsetDateTime;
043import java.util.Map;
044import java.util.Optional;
045import java.util.Set;
046import java.util.logging.Level;
047import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.Constants.APP_NAME;
048import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.Constants.VM_OP_GROUP;
049import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.Constants.VM_OP_KIND_VM;
050import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.K8s;
051import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.BalloonChangeEvent;
052import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.Exit;
053import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.HotpluggableCpuStatus;
054import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.RunnerConfigurationUpdate;
055import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.RunnerStateChange;
056import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.RunnerStateChange.State;
057import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.ShutdownEvent;
058import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.util.GsonPtr;
059import org.jgrapes.core.Channel;
060import org.jgrapes.core.Component;
061import org.jgrapes.core.annotation.Handler;
062import org.jgrapes.core.events.HandlingError;
063import org.jgrapes.core.events.Start;
064import org.jgrapes.util.events.ConfigurationUpdate;
065import org.jgrapes.util.events.InitialConfiguration;
066
067/**
068 * Updates the CR status.
069 */
070@SuppressWarnings("PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis")
071public class StatusUpdater extends Component {
072
073    private static final Set<State> RUNNING_STATES
074        = Set.of(State.RUNNING, State.TERMINATING);
075
076    private String namespace;
077    private String vmName;
078    private DynamicKubernetesApi vmCrApi;
079    private EventsV1Api evtsApi;
080    private long observedGeneration;
081    private boolean guestShutdownStops;
082    private boolean shutdownByGuest;
083
084    /**
085     * Instantiates a new status updater.
086     *
087     * @param componentChannel the component channel
088     */
089    public StatusUpdater(Channel componentChannel) {
090        super(componentChannel);
091    }
092
093    /**
094     * On handling error.
095     *
096     * @param event the event
097     */
098    @Handler(channels = Channel.class)
099    public void onHandlingError(HandlingError event) {
100        if (event.throwable() instanceof ApiException exc) {
101            logger.log(Level.WARNING, exc,
102                () -> "Problem accessing kubernetes: " + exc.getResponseBody());
103            event.stop();
104        }
105    }
106
107    /**
108     * On configuration update.
109     *
110     * @param event the event
111     */
112    @Handler
113    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
114    public void onConfigurationUpdate(ConfigurationUpdate event) {
115        event.structured("/Runner").ifPresent(c -> {
116            if (event instanceof InitialConfiguration) {
117                namespace = (String) c.get("namespace");
118                updateNamespace();
119                vmName = Optional.ofNullable((Map<String, String>) c.get("vm"))
120                    .map(vm -> vm.get("name")).orElse(null);
121            }
122        });
123    }
124
125    private void updateNamespace() {
126        if (namespace == null) {
127            var path = Path
128                .of("/var/run/secrets/kubernetes.io/serviceaccount/namespace");
129            if (Files.isReadable(path)) {
130                try {
131                    namespace = Files.lines(path).findFirst().orElse(null);
132                } catch (IOException e) {
133                    logger.log(Level.WARNING, e,
134                        () -> "Cannot read namespace.");
135                }
136            }
137        }
138        if (namespace == null) {
139            logger.warning(() -> "Namespace is unknown, some functions"
140                + " won't be available.");
141        }
142    }
143
144    /**
145     * Handle the start event.
146     *
147     * @param event the event
148     * @throws IOException 
149     * @throws ApiException 
150     */
151    @Handler
152    public void onStart(Start event) {
153        if (namespace == null) {
154            return;
155        }
156        try {
157            initVmCrApi(event);
158        } catch (IOException | ApiException e) {
159            logger.log(Level.SEVERE, e,
160                () -> "Cannot access VM's CR, terminating.");
161            event.cancel(true);
162            fire(new Exit(1));
163        }
164        try {
165            evtsApi = new EventsV1Api(Config.defaultClient());
166        } catch (IOException e) {
167            logger.log(Level.SEVERE, e,
168                () -> "Cannot access events API, terminating.");
169            event.cancel(true);
170            fire(new Exit(1));
171        }
172    }
173
174    private void initVmCrApi(Start event) throws IOException, ApiException {
175        var client = Config.defaultClient();
176        var apis = new ApisApi(client).getAPIVersions();
177        var crdVersions = apis.getGroups().stream()
178            .filter(g -> g.getName().equals(VM_OP_GROUP)).findFirst()
179            .map(V1APIGroup::getVersions).stream().flatMap(l -> l.stream())
180            .map(V1GroupVersionForDiscovery::getVersion).toList();
181        var coa = new CustomObjectsApi(client);
182        for (var crdVersion : crdVersions) {
183            var crdApiRes = coa.getAPIResources(VM_OP_GROUP,
184                crdVersion).getResources().stream()
185                .filter(r -> VM_OP_KIND_VM.equals(r.getKind())).findFirst();
186            if (crdApiRes.isEmpty()) {
187                continue;
188            }
189            @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops")
190            var crApi = new DynamicKubernetesApi(VM_OP_GROUP,
191                crdVersion, crdApiRes.get().getName(), client);
192            var vmCr = crApi.get(namespace, vmName);
193            if (vmCr.isSuccess()) {
194                vmCrApi = crApi;
195                observedGeneration
196                    = vmCr.getObject().getMetadata().getGeneration();
197                break;
198            }
199        }
200        if (vmCrApi == null) {
201            logger.severe(() -> "Cannot find VM's CR, terminating.");
202            event.cancel(true);
203            fire(new Exit(1));
204        }
205    }
206
207    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidDuplicateLiterals")
208    private JsonObject currentStatus(DynamicKubernetesObject vmCr) {
209        return vmCr.getRaw().getAsJsonObject("status").deepCopy();
210    }
211
212    /**
213     * On runner configuration update.
214     *
215     * @param event the event
216     * @throws ApiException 
217     */
218    @Handler
219    public void onRunnerConfigurationUpdate(RunnerConfigurationUpdate event)
220            throws ApiException {
221        guestShutdownStops = event.configuration().guestShutdownStops;
222
223        // Remainder applies only if we have a connection to k8s.
224        if (vmCrApi == null) {
225            return;
226        }
227        // A change of the runner configuration is typically caused
228        // by a new version of the CR. So we observe the new CR.
229        var vmCr = vmCrApi.get(namespace, vmName).throwsApiException()
230            .getObject();
231        if (vmCr.getMetadata().getGeneration() == observedGeneration) {
232            return;
233        }
234        vmCrApi.updateStatus(vmCr, from -> {
235            JsonObject status = currentStatus(from);
236            status.getAsJsonArray("conditions").asList().stream()
237                .map(cond -> (JsonObject) cond).filter(cond -> "Running"
238                    .equals(cond.get("type").getAsString()))
239                .forEach(cond -> cond.addProperty("observedGeneration",
240                    from.getMetadata().getGeneration()));
241            return status;
242        });
243    }
244
245    /**
246     * On runner state changed.
247     *
248     * @param event the event
249     * @throws ApiException 
250     */
251    @Handler
252    public void onRunnerStateChanged(RunnerStateChange event)
253            throws ApiException {
254        if (vmCrApi == null) {
255            return;
256        }
257        var vmCr = vmCrApi.get(namespace, vmName).throwsApiException()
258            .getObject();
259        vmCrApi.updateStatus(vmCr, from -> {
260            JsonObject status = currentStatus(from);
261            status.getAsJsonArray("conditions").asList().stream()
262                .map(cond -> (JsonObject) cond)
263                .forEach(cond -> {
264                    if ("Running".equals(cond.get("type").getAsString())) {
265                        updateRunningCondition(event, from, cond);
266                    }
267                });
268            if (event.state() == State.STARTING) {
269                status.addProperty("ram", GsonPtr.to(from.getRaw())
270                    .getAsString("spec", "vm", "maximumRam").orElse("0"));
271                status.addProperty("cpus", 1);
272            } else if (event.state() == State.STOPPED) {
273                status.addProperty("ram", "0");
274                status.addProperty("cpus", 0);
275            }
276            return status;
277        }).throwsApiException();
278
279        // Maybe stop VM
280        if (event.state() == State.TERMINATING && !event.failed()
281            && guestShutdownStops && shutdownByGuest) {
282            logger.info(() -> "Stopping VM because of shutdown by guest.");
283            PatchOptions patchOpts = new PatchOptions();
284            patchOpts.setFieldManager("kubernetes-java-kubectl-apply");
285            var res = vmCrApi.patch(namespace, vmName,
286                V1Patch.PATCH_FORMAT_JSON_PATCH,
287                new V1Patch("[{\"op\": \"replace\", \"path\": \"/spec/vm/state"
288                    + "\", \"value\": \"Stopped\"}]"),
289                patchOpts);
290            if (!res.isSuccess()) {
291                logger.warning(
292                    () -> "Cannot patch pod annotations: " + res.getStatus());
293            }
294        }
295
296        // Log event
297        var evt = new EventsV1Event().kind("Event")
298            .metadata(new V1ObjectMeta().namespace(namespace)
299                .generateName("vmrunner-"))
300            .reportingController(VM_OP_GROUP + "/" + APP_NAME)
301            .reportingInstance(vmCr.getMetadata().getName())
302            .eventTime(OffsetDateTime.now()).type("Normal")
303            .regarding(K8s.objectReference(vmCr))
304            .action("StatusUpdate").reason(event.reason())
305            .note(event.message());
306        evtsApi.createNamespacedEvent(namespace, evt, null, null, null, null);
307    }
308
309    private void updateRunningCondition(RunnerStateChange event,
310            DynamicKubernetesObject from, JsonObject cond) {
311        boolean reportedRunning
312            = "True".equals(cond.get("status").getAsString());
313        if (RUNNING_STATES.contains(event.state())
314            && !reportedRunning) {
315            cond.addProperty("status", "True");
316            cond.addProperty("lastTransitionTime",
317                Instant.now().toString());
318        }
319        if (!RUNNING_STATES.contains(event.state())
320            && reportedRunning) {
321            cond.addProperty("status", "False");
322            cond.addProperty("lastTransitionTime",
323                Instant.now().toString());
324        }
325        cond.addProperty("reason", event.reason());
326        cond.addProperty("message", event.message());
327        cond.addProperty("observedGeneration",
328            from.getMetadata().getGeneration());
329    }
330
331    /**
332     * On ballon change.
333     *
334     * @param event the event
335     * @throws ApiException 
336     */
337    @Handler
338    public void onBallonChange(BalloonChangeEvent event) throws ApiException {
339        if (vmCrApi == null) {
340            return;
341        }
342        var vmCr = vmCrApi.get(namespace, vmName).throwsApiException()
343            .getObject();
344        vmCrApi.updateStatus(vmCr, from -> {
345            JsonObject status = currentStatus(from);
346            status.addProperty("ram",
347                new Quantity(new BigDecimal(event.size()), Format.BINARY_SI)
348                    .toSuffixedString());
349            return status;
350        }).throwsApiException();
351    }
352
353    /**
354     * On ballon change.
355     *
356     * @param event the event
357     * @throws ApiException 
358     */
359    @Handler
360    public void onCpuChange(HotpluggableCpuStatus event) throws ApiException {
361        if (vmCrApi == null) {
362            return;
363        }
364        var vmCr = vmCrApi.get(namespace, vmName).throwsApiException()
365            .getObject();
366        vmCrApi.updateStatus(vmCr, from -> {
367            JsonObject status = currentStatus(from);
368            status.addProperty("cpus", event.usedCpus().size());
369            return status;
370        }).throwsApiException();
371    }
372
373    /**
374     * On shutdown.
375     *
376     * @param event the event
377     * @throws ApiException the api exception
378     */
379    @Handler
380    public void onShutdown(ShutdownEvent event) throws ApiException {
381        shutdownByGuest = event.byGuest();
382    }
383}
